content.description: The crux is located at the beginning of the route and towards the top. The first crux can be avoided if need be by climbing to the left of the route to the first ledge. Good holds for the most part to the top of the route. The route was established on 12/06/2020.
content.protection: Bolts and Chain Anchors at the top.
content.location: The start of the route begins on the right side of the rock. 4 black bolts can be found to the top of 2 chain anchors. The actual route is within arms reach of the bolts on the left side.

content.description: Take Little Cherry Creek Rd of Highway 15. Dirt road can be rough and not good for low clearance vehicles in spots.
